content: Who can remove attachments from an existing Jira? For example, if there are documents attached that are marked as confidential/proprietary.
@Cooper Thompson I'm happy to remove an attachment. Which Jira issue is in question?
I sent you the trackers in a PM.
Ok got it. Thank you. Looking into it now Cooper. Will update when I know more. It does seem all functionality was specifically taken away from removing attachments in this state.

You have to reverse the state to open, remove and then reapply the state. I've removed the two that were obviously sensitive. I've left it open in case you'd indicated anything additional that was sensitive so @Joshua Procious can remove those too before he re-closes it.

@Cooper Thompson could you please identify any outstanding pdf's or csv's that have proprietary info in these two tickets (https://jira.hl7.org/browse/FHIR-15627 https://jira.hl7.org/browse/FHIR-15625 ) and then I will transition back when complete?

Can you

  • remove the CSV files from https://jira.hl7.org/browse/FHIR-15625
  • remove the PDF files from https://jira.hl7.org/browse/FHIR-15627

Hello Cooper, thank you for your patience on this. I've removed the CSV and PDF files respectively. FHIR-15625 has been transitioned back to it's original "Resolved - no change" status. FHIR-15627 seems to have been properly set to "waiting for input". Let me know if you need anything else on this!
